abstract_summ: Understanding of the pathophysiology of COVID-19 relies on an understanding of interplaying mechanisms, including SARS-CoV-2 virulence, human immune response, and complex inflammatory reactions with coagulation playing a major role . A comprehensive understanding of pathological mechanisms will increase the efficacy of therapy and decrease mortality . A proper combination of antiviral agents, immune modulators such as prednisolone, and anticoagulants could be employed to minimize lung damage and prevent systemic involvements .
